- Backup data follows the same retention period.

- Remote‑work: up to 3 days/week, VPN/MFA required, equipment approved.
- Data‑retention: keep 7 years, encrypted archives, secure deletion.
- Expense reimbursement: submit receipts within 30 days, approved by manager, reimbursement within payroll cycle.
- Travel policy: book approved vendors, airfare economy class, daily per‑diem limits.
- IT security: password rotation every 90 days, endpoint encryption, annual penetration testing.
- HR onboarding: complete background check, sign confidentiality agreement, 1‑week orientation.
- Code of ethics: no conflicts of interest, gifts under $100 must be disclosed.
- Whistleblower: anonymous reporting channel, protection from retaliation.
- Phishing training: quarterly simulated phishing, mandatory completion.
- Incident response: 24‑hour reporting, containment steps, post‑mortem analysis.
